CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Iron
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: iron
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Iron is a robust elemental metal, celebrated for its exceptional strength and versatility. Essential in construction, tool-making, and weaponry, iron forms the backbone of many modern and ancient applications.
